scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:utilities && npm run build:legacy && npm run build:root && npm run copy && npm run generate:import-map
scripts.copy: mkdir -p build && npm run copy:api && npm run copy:utilities && npm run copy:root && npm run copy:legacy
scripts.lint: npm run lint:legacy && npm run lint:utilities && npm run lint:api && npm run lint:root
scripts.format: npm run format:legacy && npm run format:utilities && npm run format:api && npm run format:root
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd api && npm install && cd .. && cd root && npm install && cd .. && cd legacy && npm install && cd .. && cd utilities && npm install && cd ..
scripts.serve: node ./server/scripts/start.js && concurrently "npm run serve:apps" "npm run serve:base-wait" "npm run show-ready"
scripts.serve:modules: concurrently "npm run serve:api" "npm run serve:utilities" "npm run serve:modebar"
scripts.serve:base-wait: wait-on http://0.0.0.0:9093 && wait-on http://0.0.0.0:9094 && wait-on http://0.0.0.0:9095 && npm run serve:base
